traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc:
The drider is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): poison spray, thaumaturgy, mage hand, ray of frost
1st level (4 slots): bane, detect magic, sanctuary, magic missile, shield
2nd level (3 slots): hold person, silence, web, invisibility
3rd level (3 slots): clairvoyance, dispel magic, fireball, lightning bolt
4th level (1 slot): freedom of movement, greater invisibility

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three attacks (Longsword/Longbow). One can be Bite.
